Kisame creates an orb of water that releases countless [[Water Release: Water Shark Bullet Technique|water sharks]] that rapidly assault the opponent. If the orb is released underwater, the strength of the sharks is greatly enhanced and all of them colliding with the target will result in an enormous implosion.
